require: function checkrequirements(uj) if uj.storage['roomsdc_r'] and uj.storage['roomsdc_sr'] and uj.storage['roomsdc_sr'] then return true else return false end end return checkrequirements
function checkrequirements(uj) local result = false for i,v in ipairs(uj.storage) do if v >= 10 then result = true end end return result end return checkrequirements
function checkrequirements(uj) print(inspect(uj)) if uj.storage['samurair'] then return true else return false end end return checkrequirements
